data.comment: The big names in today's match at Roazhon Park have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Rennes.
In the minute 15, Rennes push upfield but Karim Abed quickly pulls them for offside.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Rennes.
Karim Abed awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Rennes.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Free kick Rennes.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Roazhon Park.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Nayef Aguerd (Rennes) strikes at Roazhon Park but his header is cleared.
Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
Rennes are pushing forward but Romain Del Castillo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 25, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Rennes.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Bordeaux.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Rennes territory.
At Roazhon Park, Rennes are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Rennes's half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Bordeaux are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bordeaux's Mehdi Zerkane gets in a shot on goal at Roazhon Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Goal! Bordeaux have got their heads in front thanks to a Hatem Ben Arfa strike.
Samuel Kalu instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Rennes.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rennes's half?
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Romain Del Castillo hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Rennes in Rennes.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway in Rennes.
In the minute 46, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In Rennes, Enock Kwateng (Bordeaux) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Rennes.
In the minute 47, Bordeaux's Samuel Kalu has been booked in Rennes.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Karim Abed signals a throw-in for Rennes, close to Bordeaux's area.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 53, Free kick Rennes.
Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Rennes push forward at Roazhon Park and Benjamin Bourigeaud gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bordeaux defence.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Rennes.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Rennes territory.
In the minute 55, Karim Abed awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Rennes.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rennes.
In the minute 57, Karim Abed signals a Rennes throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Julien Stephan is making the team's first substitution at Roazhon Park with Jeremy Doku replacing Romain Del Castillo.
In the minute 58, Rennes make their second substitution with Hamari Traore replacing Brandon Soppy.
Remi Oudin is replacing Samuel Kalu for the away team.
Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a second substitution, with Amadou Traore replacing Mehdi Zerkane.
Karim Abed signals a Rennes throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
In the minute 60, Free kick Rennes.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Josh Maja with Jimmy Briand. This is the third substitution made today by Jean-Louis Gasset.
Adrien Hunou is on a sub for Martin Terrier for Rennes.
Rennes drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Rennes.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Karim Abed awards Rennes a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Rennes in Rennes.
In the minute 64, Sehrou Guirassy (Rennes) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Bordeaux needs to be cautious. Rennes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Enock Kwateng (Bordeaux) has received a yellow card from Karim Abed.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Roazhon Park.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rennes's half?
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flavien Tait for Rennes has been booked by Karim Abed and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Yann Gboho is replacing Flavien Tait for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Rennes.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 71, At Roazhon Park, Adrien Truffert has been yellow-carded for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, Rennes are caught offside.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Yacine Adli is replacing Hatem Ben Arfa for Bordeaux at Roazhon Park.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
The home team replace Sehrou Guirassy with Mbaye Niang.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Bordeaux at Roazhon Park.
Rennes to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
In the minute 81, Jeremy Doku (Rennes) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Roazhon Park.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Rennes are coming forward and Jeremy Doku gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
In the minute 83, Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Rennes.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
At Roazhon Park the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Karim Abed signals a Rennes throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Rennes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bordeaux's half?
Free kick for Rennes in the half of Bordeaux.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
